details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - Creator and xmp:CreatorTool
details.description: The value of Creator entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property xmp:CreatorTool shall be equivalent.

rule.description: The value of Creator entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property xmp:CreatorTool shall be equivalent.

error.message: The value of Creator entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property xmp:CreatorTool are not equivalent (Info /Creator = %1, XMP xmp:CreatorTool = %2)
